com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.rmi
Class TieGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.rmi.TieGenerator

public class TieGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for generating the tie classes for the RMI interfaces. These Tie classes will act as container boundary for validation purposes much like the home interface.
